remarks: Subspace ` H ` of a Hilbert space.  A subspace is a subset of Hilbert space which contains the zero vector and is closed under vector addition and scalar multiplication.  Definition of [Beran] p. 95.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
